name: Slaves to Legok: Caves of Gud
name_original: Slaves to Legok: Caves of Gud
description:
This was a lot of fun to make! 

The project is heavily under development at this stage, I tried to make this all during a game jam.

Right now, all this project contains is a randomly-generated village-like test area with paths between each structure, a river, and simulated wheat field along the river. I joined the jam late and sorta underestimated how many of the underlying systems I would have to implement.

Development will continue after the game jam under the project name of "Lands of Siron", so check back! Please base game jam ratings on this version of the game.
